==Japanese==
{{wikipedia|lang=ja}}
{{ja-kanjitab|かい|そう|yomi=o}}

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|かいそう}}

# [[seagrass]]

====Usage notes====
This term is often confused with the homophonic {{ja-r|海藻|かいそう}}, which means [[seaweed]]. For distinction, this term is sometimes read as うみくさ.
